name: Tales From Rostra
description:
Tales From Rostra is a small RPG game with narrative-altering choices. You play as Fargas, Arcelus, Oberon, and Frea. A group of 4 deserters from the military who went looking for Fargas's sister after all connections with her got cut off.

This hour+ prototype includes 25 different player skills, 13 different items to use, 7 different enemies, two bosses, 28 NPCs, and 4 different endings.

Normally, players would start out with 1 skill for each character, level up, and spend stat points to unlock additional skills, but for the sake of demonstrating the different skills, this build starts out with each player character having 4 high level skill.
